ing: 1 1/2 pounds thinly sliced deli cooked ham, minced
3/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®), or to taste
des: "Dill makes a difference! This ham salad with dill pickle is great for full sandwiches, and can also be used for tea sandwiches or as a snack spread on crackers or chips. It is best with deli ham that is cooked rather than smoked or honey-baked."
ins: Stir ham, mayonnaise, dill pickle, Dijon mustard, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl.
